svg:

Needs:- IP address- Destination portSource Port16 bitsDestination port16 bitsSegmentDatagramSource IP (32 bits)Destination IP (32 bits)SegmentPayloadOther headers...Length(16 bits)Checksum(16 bits)- Payload is variable (based on length)- Everything else is in 8 bytes (word)- Checksum is for error checking
